text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
As tryouts draw near, hopeful<n>students are given a chance
to<n>demonstrate their abilities to trainers.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Deciding to observe the students'<n>training progress, I head
off to the<n>course, when an indignant voice<n>catches my
attention.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Gosh, I've already said this a million<n>times!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: I do have talent! I'm going toprove it at the tryouts and procuremyself a first-rate trainer! If you don'tbelieve me...

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Then there's nothing more I have to<n>say to you. Goodbye!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Sigh... Geez, doesn't she knowthat I don't have time to talk on thephone right now—

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Aaah! Wh-who are you? A stalker?!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I quickly clear up the<n>misunderstanding by introducing<n>
myself as a new trainer.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Oh, is that so? Well then, excuse me.<n>But consider yourself
lucky that you<n>were able to catch me by surprise.<n>It's a
rare sight, so let's call it even.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
...Hey, what's with the face? Do you<n>not understand how
grateful you<n>should be right now?

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Don't tell me... Do you not know who<n>I am?!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
My goodness me, what a travesty!<n>We mustn't waste any
time—follow<n>me!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: She forcibly drags me along to the<n>central square.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: All right everyone, assemble!

text_block_list.name: King Halo's Followers
text_block_list.text: Okaaay!

text_block_list.name: Cat-eyed Umamusume
text_block_list.text: What's happening, King?

text_block_list.name: Bob-cut Umamusume
text_block_list.text: Who's this?

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
A new trainer. But for some reason,<n>this person has no idea
who I am!<n>Isn't that just absolutely tragic?

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: That's why it's time for a proper<n>introduction!

text_block_list.name: King Halo's Followers
text_block_list.text: You got it!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Hehe, that's what I like to hear! Let's<n>begin!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: What's my name?

text_block_list.name: King Halo's Followers
text_block_list.text: King!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: What am I?

text_block_list.name: Cat-eyed Umamusume
text_block_list.text: A winner!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: How's my future?

text_block_list.name: Bob-cut Umamusume
text_block_list.text: Bright and beloved!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: That's right! For I am the one and<n>only—

text_block_list.name: Everyone
text_block_list.text: —King Halo!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
...Hey, what's with that empty look on<n>your face? Where's
my applause?!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
I just went out of my way to do a<n>whole self-introduction
for you! You<n>should be crying tears of joy while<n>clapping!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Indeed it was. I'm sure the<n>introduction has told you all that
you<n>need to know—that the elegant,<n>charming, and
dignified King is a<n>first-rate racer.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Surely now you understand the sheer<n>magnificence, the
intelligence, and the<n>expectations that I embody. And how<n>
it's only natural for the entire school<n>to be captivated by
me?

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
What?! How could that possibly have<n>flown over your
head? You...<n>good-for-nothing!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Geez... Very well, once more from the<n>top! Everyone, get in
your positions!

text_block_list.name: Cat-eyed Umamusume
text_block_list.text: But King, shouldn't you get going<n>soon?

text_block_list.name: Cat-eyed Umamusume
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, didn't you say you were going<n>to be training with the
others today to<n>prepare for the tryouts?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The training course is already filled<n>with students going
through their<n>practice routines. A large number of<n>trainers
have gathered to watch.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Pant, pant... Ohohoho! I'm sureyou were all dying to see me! Ohoho...Cough.

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
Well, well, if it isn't King. Did you<n>sprint all the way here
just to make it<n>in time? Take a little break and catch<n>your
breath, okay?

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
As if I need a break! There are more<n>important things right
now. Look<n>around you—all these trainers have<n>gathered
here to observe my<n>prowess!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Rest is for the weak! Ohohoho!

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Well... You do you, I suppose.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Hey, King! I'm glad you came too. I<n>was about to start
training. Do you<n>want to join?

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Of course! Sky, come with us too. I'll<n>give you the honor of
eating my dust!

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Okay! Last one there bites the dust!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Hey! No cheating!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: What, are we starting already?! Wait<n>for me!

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
Haha, well if it isn't the trickster Seiun<n>Sky, the
hard-working Special Week,<n>and the well-to-do King Halo.

text_block_list.name: New Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
They certainly have their own quirks!<n>I'm excited to see
how those three<n>will perform in the tryouts!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
From the sidelines, I watch as King<n>Halo and the others race
excitedly<n>against each other.
